bibl.title: Letter from Dorma V. Schnurr to [Lawrence?] Reed, [19--]

div1.head: Letter from Dorma V. Schnurr to [Lawrence?] Reed, [19--]
div1.opener:
THORACIC SURGERY
BRONCHOSCOPY
ESOPHAGOSCOPY
EDGAR W. DAVIS, M. D., F. A. C. S.
AND
ROY G. KLEPSER, M. D.
1150 CONNECTICUT AVENUE, N. W.
WASHINGTON 6, D. C.
General Reed:
div1.p:
My address is:
Suite 73
1150 Connecticut Ave.

The telephone number is Republic 4475
I am leaving for Minnesota on Thursday, Dec. 19, at 4:35 P.M.
div1.closer:
Sincerely, Dorma V. Schnurr Write letter for Gen Reed
to sign.
